Class BuildingDrawer

Design a building by drawing a floor plan and scaling it with the desired number of stories.

Inheritance
System.Object
UnityEngine.Object
UnityEngine.Component
UnityEngine.Behaviour
UnityEngine.MonoBehaviour

Namespace: DUKE
Assembly: Assembly-CSharp.dll
Syntax

Methods

AddToHorizontalRun(Vector3, Vector3, Single, List<Vector3>, List<Int32>, Int32, Single)

Create a part of a horizontal frame mesh.

Declaration
protected void AddToHorizontalRun(Vector3 _vA, Vector3 _vB, float _height, List<Vector3> _verts, List<int> _tris, int _runResolution, float _meshThickness)
Parameters
Type Name Description
UnityEngine.Vector3 _vA

Point (from).
UnityEngine.Vector3 _vB

Point (to).
System.Single _height

Height.
System.Collections.Generic.List<UnityEngine.Vector3> _verts

A list of vertices the part is added to.
System.Collections.Generic.List<System.Int32> _tris

A list of triangles the part is added to.
System.Int32 _runResolution

Determines the cross-section shape of the run.
System.Single _meshThickness

Determines the cross-section thickness of the run.

UnityEngine.Vector3 _bot

A list of vertices the part is added to.
System.Collections.Generic.List<System.Int32> _tris

A list of triangles the part is added to.
System.Int32 _runResolution

System.Single _meshThickness

Declaration
protected Vector3 GridCoordinatesToWorldPosition(int _x, int _y, bool _returnCellCenterPosition = false)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.Int32 _x

Grid coordinate position on X-axis.
System.Int32 _y

Grid coordinate position on Y-axis.
System.Boolean _returnCellCenterPosition

TRUE when the center of the DrawCell should be returned. FALSE when the lower left corner should be returned instead.
Returns
Type Description
UnityEngine.Vector3

World coordinate position of the specified DrawCell.
